clinical_study.brief_title: Big Data Construction and Biological Etiological Epidemiology Study of Children Epilepsy in China
clinical_study.official_title: Big Data Construction and Biological Etiological Epidemiology Study of Children Epilepsy in China

lead_sponsor.agency: Xinhua Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine

clinical_study.source: Xinhua Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to develop the electronic management platform for children with epilepsy, establish large data of Chinese children with epilepsy and explore its biological etiology.

detailed_description.textblock: The establishment of the electronic management platform for children with epilepsy and large data of epilepsy in Chinese children as well as the epidemiological study its biological etiology.

primary_outcome.measure: The data of over 10 thousand childhood epilepsy patients in China
primary_outcome.time_frame: 26 month after developing a public platform for electronic analysis and management
primary_outcome.description: To develop a public platform for electronic analysis and management of children epilepsy to doctors and patients in China

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of several different causes of children epilepsy in China
secondary_outcome.description: A surveillance mechanism will be developed to identify and recruit children with epilepsy from the public platform for electronic analysis management of children epilepsy for doctors and patients

other_outcome.time_frame: 30 days after receipt of DNA sample
other_outcome.description: To detect the mutation and characterize the genetic architecture and risk variants of epilepsy using genomic methods

other_outcome.time_frame: 7days after receipt of blood sample or/and cerebrospinal fluid
other_outcome.description: To test Inflammatory factors, Autoimmune antibodies , Immunoglobulin

other_outcome.time_frame: 7days after receipt of blood sample or/and urine
other_outcome.description: To test tandem mass spectrometry and enzyme

other_outcome.time_frame: 7days after receipt of blood sample, urine and cerebrospinal fluid

arm_group.description: patients with Immunological marker and Immunotherapy (+)
patients with the Infection of central nervous system
patients with abnormal image of brain

study_pop.textblock: 0-14 years old epilepsy patients in China

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Children with epilepsy diagnosis, seizure types and causes of disease classification in accordance with the International Association for the diagnosis and treatment of epilepsy in 2015 guidelines
- Epilepsy children Included 0-14 years old from outpatients and inpatients by the Children's epilepsy specialist using iGrowSys management platform and clinical research, and medical records data entry complete in all China
Exclusion Criteria:
- The patients that recorded data is not complete, telephone and communication address unknown
- The patients that families do not have Internet or children and families will not access the Internet, can not be online operation
